SELECT toc.fUuid AS "uuid", toc.fOperationCombineName AS "operationCombineName", u.fUserName AS "creator", toc.fRemainingAccount AS "remainingAccount", toc.fMaxInvalidCount AS "maxInvalidCount" FROM t_operation_combine toc LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.fLoginName = toc.fCreator WHERE 1 = 1
AND toc.fOperationCombineName LIKE '${groupSettingCriteria.operationCombineName}%'
AND toc.fOperationCombineName > ''
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM t_group g WHERE toc.fUuid = g.fOperationCombineUuid AND g.fGroupName LIKE '${groupSettingCriteria.optimizedGroupName}%')
AND toc.fTerminalType = #{groupSettingCriteria.terminalType}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_group_setting gs WHERE gs.fOperationCombineUuid = toc.fUuid
AND gs.fOperationType > ''
AND gs.fOperationType = #{groupSettingCriteria.operationType}
AND gs.fOperationType IS NULL
)
AND toc.fRemainingAccount > 0
GROUP BY toc.fUuid ORDER BY toc.fCreateTime DESC

SELECT CONCAT(toc.fOperationCombineName, '_____', toc.fUuid) FROM t_operation_combine toc WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM t_group g WHERE g.fOperationCombineUuid = toc.fUuid ) AND toc.fTerminalType = #{terminalType} ORDER BY toc.fOperationCombineName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_operation_combine(fOperationCombineName, fTerminalType, fCreator, fMaxInvalidCount) VALUES(#{operationCombineName}, #{terminalType}, #{creator}, #{maxInvalidCount})
